Key Match Events: Bowden Francis took a no-hitter into the 6th inning, Blue Jays beat Red Sox 2-0
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Blue Jays took the series 3-2, tying the regular season series 7-7
The game was played at Fenway Park with an attendance of 31,712
Others: The Blue Jays won the game 2-0, with Bowden Francis pitching 7 innings and allowing no earned runs
